message.name: ERR_FUNDCONFIGURATION_FV_EFFECTIVE_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_AFTER_TODAY
message.locale: The Effective Date, %1d, must be on or after the current date.

message.name: ERR_FUNDCONFIGURATION_XFV_BOTH_WAIT_LIST_ALLOWED_OVER_OBLIGATION_ALLOWED_WHEN_CREATE_OBLIGATION_CANNOT_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: The Wait List Allowed and Over Obligation Allowed When Creating Obligation indicator cannot both be selected.

message.name: ERR_FUNDCONFIGURATION_XRV_FUND_IS_NOT_ACTIVE_CONFIGURATION_CANNOT_BE_CREATED
message.locale: The Fund is '%1c', the fund configuration cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_FUNDCONFIGURATION_XRV_EFFECTIVE_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_AFTER_FUND_START_DATE
message.locale: The Effective Date, %1d, must be on or after the Fund Start Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_FUNDCONFIGURATION_XRV_EFFECTIVE_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_BEFORE_FUND_END_DATE
message.locale: The Effective Date, %1d, must be on or before the Fund End Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_FUNDCONFIGURATION_XRV_IS_NOT_IN_EDIT_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: The fund configuration is '%1c', it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_FUNDCONFIGURATION_XRV_IS_NOT_IN_EDIT_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The fund configuration is '%1c', it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_FUNDCONFIGURATION_XRV_ACTIVE_RECORD_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: An 'Active' fund configuration already exists from, %1d.

message.name: ERR_FUNDCONFIGURATION_FV_COMMENTS_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long (%1n) - maximum allowed is '%2n'.

message.name: ERR_FUNDCONFIGURATION_XRV_FUND_IS_CANCELLED_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The fund has already been canceled, this fund configuration cannot be modified.
The fund has already been cancelled, this fund configuration cannot be modified.
